# <a name="adding-emojis-to-email-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="44e2b-102">Dodavanje emotikona u poruke e-pošte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44e2b-102">Adding emojis to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="44e2b-103">Možete da umetnete emotikone u svoje poruke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44e2b-103">You can insert emojis in your messages.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="44e2b-104">Odgovaranje na postojeće mejl ili izaberite **novu poruku**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44e2b-104">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="44e2b-105">Izaberite dugme za **Umetanje emotikona**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44e2b-105">Select the **Insert emojis** button</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="44e2b-106">na dnu prozoru za pisanje da biste otvorili okno izraza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44e2b-106">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="44e2b-107">Pronađite i odaberite emoji ili GIF koji želite da umetnete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44e2b-107">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>
